name: Short Fused
description:
SHORT FUSED

This project was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 by Jaden Evanskey, Chris Tsoiasue, and Braedon Schmidt in 48 hours.

It is a puzzle platformer, that fits the "Joined Together" theme because of the connected movement/physics between the two players.

It's a singleplayer game with two characters being controlled, but two people can play at the same time too if desired.

Get to the two exits at the same time (1 player at each) by working together... WITH YOURSELF. Use the various terrain types, and your heightened mobility, tactfully. Fuse and unfuse with buttons.

Thanks for checking our game out! We had a lot of fun making it. :) Please leave a comment and let us know what you thought/any suggestions!

Controls:

  • Player 1
    • Movement - WASD
    • Jump - Space
  • Player 2
    • Movement - Arrow Keys
    • Jump -Right Ctrl
  • Misc
    • Pause - Esc
    • Restart - R
